data.prayer: Father, you said, "The earth belongs to Me and all that is in it". Please, call Girona, Cataluña, Spain into obedience and eternal life.
data.verse: The earth is Yahweh’s, with its fullness; the world, and those who dwell therein.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Girona, Cataluña, Spain
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Girona, Cataluña, Spain honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 11,974 believers in Girona that when they seek first your Kingdom and your righteousness, you will abundantly provide all they need.
data.verse: And God is able to bless you abundantly, so that in all things at all times, having all that you need, you will abound in every good work.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the county of Girona, Cataluña, Spain need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Olot
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Olot, Cataluña, Spain.
Father, you desire the people in the county of Girona who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Father, like with the Ethiopian Eunuch, set up a meeting today between a faithful believer in Girona, Cataluña, Spain and a person seeking to understand the truth.
data.verse: The eunuch asked Philip, “Tell me, please, who is the prophet talking about, himself or someone else?” Then Philip began with that very passage of Scripture and told him the good news about Jesus.

data.section_summary:
the county of Girona, Cataluña, Spain has a population of 747,800.

We estimate Girona has 11,974 people who might know Jesus, 566,147 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 169,679 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 62 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, remind your church in Girona that they can know and depend on the love you have for them.
data.verse: We know and have believed the love which God has for us. God is love, and he who remains in love remains in God, and God remains in him.

location.name: Girona
location.cities_list: Girona, Figueres, Blanes, Lloret de Mar, Olot
location.cities_list_w_pop: Girona (96,188), Figueres (43,330), Blanes (40,047), Lloret de Mar (39,363), Olot (33,524)
